rukus.text: 20|116|geuttae hananim-eun cheonsadeul-ege adam-ege buboghala hamae ibeulli seuleul je-oehan moduga buboghayeossdeola
20|117|hananim-i adam-ege adam-a igeos-i balo neowa ne anaeui jeog ila geuga neohuileul yuhoghayeo cheongug eseo jjoch-anae neohuileul bulhaenghage ha lyeo hanola
20|120|geuleona satan-i adam-a naeganeoleul yeongsaeng-ui namuwa bulmyeol-ui wang-gug eulo annaehayeo juliyo lago sogsag yeossdeola

20|121|geuleohge hayeo geudeul-i geugeos eul meog-eumae geudeul-ui beolgeobeos-eum-i geudeul-ege natanassdeola geuleoja geudeul eun cheongug-ui namu ip-eulo geugos-eul ga ligi sijaghaessgo adam-eun geuui junim ui myeonglyeong-eul baebanhaess-euni geuneun banghwang hage doeeossdeola
20|122|geuleona junim-eun geuleul seontaeghasyeossgo geuneun geubun-ege hoegaehani geu bun-eun geuleul indohasyeossnola

20|123|geubunkkeseo neohui moduneun yeo giseo nagala seologa seolo-ege jeog ila geuleona naega neohuiege bog-eum eul bonael geos-ila naui bog-eum-eul tta leuneun janeun banghwanghaji anihago bul haenghaji anh-eul geos-ila
20|124|geuleona naui gyohun-e deung-eul dollineun janeun nuguna gungpibhal geos-i myeo simpan-ui nal-e ulineun geuleul jangnim eulo mandeul-eo buhwalke halila
20|125|geuttae geuga juyeo wae jeoleul jangnim-eulo buleusyeossnaikka jeoneun silyeog i iss-eossnaida lago hani
20|126|geubunkkeseo malsseumhasa uliga neoege yejeung-eul bonaess-euna neoneun geu geos-eul musihaess-euni oneul-eun nega mu si danghalila
20|127|hananim-eun gyeong-gyeleul beos-eonago junim-ui gyesileul midji anihan jaleul eungbeolhasimae naese-ui eungbeol-eun hancheung simhago gyesogdoenila

20|128|hananim-i geudeul-eul wihan ye jung-eulo eolmana manh-eun sedaeleul myeolmang ke hayeossdeonyo geudeul-i jigeum geu geoju jieseo salgo issji anhdeonyo geuan-e neun jihyega issneun salamdeul-eul wihan ye jeungdeul-i issnola
